name: Pick Up All
overview: Diamonds are forever! Or so it says in some movie, and in the valley these little minerals are a good investment. Jörg Pöhland from Klingenthal probably also used this saying when he programmed his game "Pick Up All". In the end it brought him 200 marks in one fell swoop. There are hardly any gemstones could buy for that amount, but you will certainly find them in the game! A Boulder Dash style game published in both 64'er 1991/04, and later in 64'er Sonderheft 79.
